com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui

Class GuiList<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui.AbstractNode
      • com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui.GuiContainer
        • com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui.GuiList<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the entry type stored within this list, the type can implement IListItem if toString() is needed for something else.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEventListener<GuiButton,java.lang.Boolean,java.lang.Integer>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GuiSelectionList

    public class GuiList<T>
extends GuiContainer
implements IEventListener<GuiButton,java.lang.Boolean,java.lang.Integer>
    This GUI node is a list that has a built-in scrollbar.
    Author:
    Maxstupo

    • Field Summary

      • renderFirst

        protected void renderFirst(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
        Description copied from class: AbstractNode
        Called once before AbstractNode.render(Graphics2D) and after all child nodes have had this method called as well.
        This method can be requested to be called next render using AbstractNode.setGraphicsCalculationsDirty().

        This method shouldn't draw anything, it should just use the graphics context to calculate variables (e.g. the dimensions of a string).

        Overrides:
        renderFirst in class AbstractNode
        Parameters:
        g - the graphics context.

      • getItemText

        protected java.lang.String getItemText(T t)
        Returns the correct string for the given item. If the item implements IListItem the method will return IListItem.getItemName() instead of Object.toString().
        Parameters:
        t - the object to get the correct text from.
        Returns:
        the correct text.

        protected void rebuildItemNodes()
